about_the_game:
Dive into the action with Master of the Arena, an electrifying arena brawler for up to 8 players! Battle it out solo or with friends in intense, skill-based rounds that challenge your reflexes and strategy. Whether you aim to be the last one standing or prefer to team up against relentless monsters, every match is an adrenaline-filled experience.

Gameplay Highlights

  • Customizable Abilities: Tailor your skill set to fit your playstyle, experimenting with different combos to outsmart opponents.

  • Solo and Co-op Modes: Test your mettle in free-for-all battles or form alliances to take down powerful foes in cooperative challenges.

  • Local Multiplayer: Bring the chaos to your living room with support for up to 8 players in local multiplayer action.

Key Features

  • Fast-paced, skill-based combat

  • Deep customization for endless replayability

  • Exciting solo and multiplayer modes

  • Challenging monsters and dynamic rounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 509 MB available space
